GH-3726: Add support for $sampleRate match expression.
GH-3726: Add support for $sampleRate aggregation operation
Add Criteria infix functions for `maxDistance` and `minDistance`
Add support for $rand aggregation operator.
Fix a typo in `MongoConverter` javadoc
Add support for `$degreesToRadians`, `$sin`, `$sinh`, `$cos`, `$cosh`, `$tan` and `$tanh` aggregation operators.
Run unpaged query using `Pageable.unpaged()` through `QuerydslMongoPredicateExecutor.findAll(…)`
Update tests/ci to MongoDB Server 5.0.
Fix build on Java 16.
Add support for `$dateAdd` and `$dateDiff` aggregation operators
Add support for `$integral` aggregation operator.
Extend support for `$ifNull` to cover multiple conditions.
Add support for $expMovingAvg aggregation operator.
Add support for $derivative aggregation operator.
Add support for $rank, $denseRank, $documentNumber & $shift aggregation operators.
Add support for $covariancePop & $covarianceSamp aggregation expressions.
Add support for $setWindowFields aggregation stage.
Add support for creating Time Series collection.
Fix raw document conversion in Collection like properties.
Custom Converter should also be applicable for simple types.
Adapt to API consolidation in Spring Data Commons' PersistentProperty.
Build a MongoDB 5.0.0 container.
Fix NPE when reading/mapping null value inside collection.
Fix Regression in generating queries with nested maps with numeric keys
Fix build on Java 16
Add equals and hashcode to UnwrappedMongoPersistentProperty (fixes #3683)
Fix field projection value conversion.
Add missing double quote to GeoJson.java JSDoc header
Upgrade to Querydsl 5.0
Add support for Wildcard Index
Fix conversion for Map/Collection like types having a converter registered.
Fix query mapper path resolution for types considered simple ones.
Enhance support for linking documents.
Add an option to @Field annotation to control property write rules
Aggregation query method should be able to return `Slice` and `Stream`
Fix NPE in QueryMapper when trying to apply target type on null value.
Fix $or / $nor keyword mapping in query mapper.
Fix bullet points in aggregations framework asciidoc
Fix NPE in declarative aggregation execution.
Handle nested Pattern in Criteria equals
Return saved entity reference instead of original reference.
Fix query mapping resolution of properties using underscore within field name.
Rename Embedded annotation to Unwrapped.
Fix ShardKey lookup for nested paths.
Support expressions in query field projections.
Fix CustomConverter conversions.
Preserve class keyword as Map key during update mapping.
Reject saving collection like entities (Lists, Iterator,...) via MongoTemplate.save
Introduce ConversionContext and clean up MappingMongoConverter
Remove duplicate JSON Schema section from reference documentation.
Translate MongoSocketException subclasses to DataAccessResourceFailureException
Preserve numeric keys that exceed Long range when mapping Updates.
Fix case insensitive derived in queries on String properties.
Use UUID toString representation for UUID values when converting org.bson.Document to json String
Fix Criteria chaining for Criteria.alike(Example).
Use relaxed type mapping for aggregations by default.
DATAMONGO-2664: Added a serializers module to all GeoJson types
GH-3474 - Update QBE Documentation section.
Deprecate KPropertyPath in favor of Spring Data Common's KPropertyPath.
DATAMONGO-2651 - Support $accumulator in GroupOperationBuilder.
DATAMONGO-2671 - Fix dateFromParts millisecond field name.
DATAMONGO-1902 - Add support for embedding objects.
DATAMONGO-2663 - Document Spring Data to MongoDB compatibility.
DATAMONGO-2661 - Handle nullable types for KPropertyPath
[DATAMONGO-2655] Add missing `aggregate` extension
DATAMONGO-2652 - Implements deleteAllById.
DATAMONGO-2659 - Allow disk use on query
DATAMONGO-2635 - Enforce aggregation pipeline mapping.
DATAMONGO-2616 - Short circuit id value conversion in MongoConverter.
DATAMONGO-2633 - Fix json parsing of nested arrays in ParameterBindingDocumentCodec.
DATAMONGO-2623 - Add support for $function & $accumulator aggregation operators.
DATAMONGO-2622 - Add support for $unionWith aggregation stage.
Fix to make a list item properly render
